ayas.translation: And of Musa's people was a party who guided (people) with the truth, and thereby did they do justice.
ayas.transliteration: wa min qawmi mūsā ummatun yahdūna bil ḥaqqi wabihi ya`dilūn

ayas.arabic: وَقَطَّعْنَـٰهُمُ ٱثْنَتَىْ عَشْرَةَ أَسْبَاطًا أُمَمًا ۚ وَأَوْحَيْنَآ إِلَىٰ مُوسَىٰٓ إِذِ ٱسْتَسْقَىٰهُ قَوْمُهُۥٓ أَنِ ٱضْرِب بِّعَصَاكَ ٱلْحَجَرَ ۖ فَٱنۢبَجَسَتْ مِنْهُ ٱثْنَتَا عَشْرَةَ عَيْنًا ۖ قَدْ عَلِمَ كُلُّ أُنَاسٍ مَّشْرَبَهُمْ ۚ وَظَلَّلْنَا عَلَيْهِمُ ٱلْغَمَـٰمَ وَأَنزَلْنَا عَلَيْهِمُ ٱلْمَنَّ وَٱلسَّلْوَىٰ ۖ كُلُوا۟ مِن طَيِّبَـٰتِ مَا رَزَقْنَـٰكُمْ ۚ وَمَا ظَلَمُونَا وَلَـٰكِن كَانُوٓا۟ أَنفُسَهُمْ يَظْلِمُونَ
ayas.translation: And We divided them into twelve tribes, as nations; and We revealed to Musa when his people asked him for water: Strike the rock with your staff, so outnowed from it twelve springs; each tribe knew its drinking place; and We made the clouds to give shade over them and We sent to them manna and quails: Eat of the good things We have given you. And they did not do Us any harm, but they did injustice to their own souls.
ayas.transliteration: waqaṭṭa`nāhumuth-natay `ashrata asbāṭan umamā ۚ wa-awḥaynā ilā mūsā idhis-tasqāhu qawmuhu aniḍ-rib bi`aṣākal ḥajar ۖ fanbajasat minhuth-natā `ashrata `aynā ۖ qad `alima kullu unāsin mashrabahum ۚ waẓallalnā `alayhimul ghamāma wa-anzalnā `alayhimul manna was salwā ۖ kulū min ṭayyibāti mā razaqnākum ۚ wa mā ẓalamūnā walākin kānū anfusahum yaẓlimūn

ayas.arabic: وَإِذْ قِيلَ لَهُمُ ٱسْكُنُوا۟ هَـٰذِهِ ٱلْقَرْيَةَ وَكُلُوا۟ مِنْهَا حَيْثُ شِئْتُمْ وَقُولُوا۟ حِطَّةٌ وَٱدْخُلُوا۟ ٱلْبَابَ سُجَّدًا نَّغْفِرْ لَكُمْ خَطِيٓـَٔـٰتِكُمْ ۚ سَنَزِيدُ ٱلْمُحْسِنِينَ
ayas.translation: And when it was said to them: Reside in this town and eat from it wherever you wish, and say, Put down from us our heavy burdens: and enter the gate making obeisance, We will forgive you your wrongs: We will give more to those who do good (to others).
ayas.transliteration: wa idh qīla lahumus skunū hādhihil qaryata wakulū minhā ḥaythu shi-tum waqūlū ḥiṭṭatun wadkhulul bāba sujjadan naghfir lakum khaṭī-ātikum ۚ sanazīdul muḥsinīn

ayas.arabic: فَبَدَّلَ ٱلَّذِينَ ظَلَمُوا۟ مِنْهُمْ قَوْلًا غَيْرَ ٱلَّذِى قِيلَ لَهُمْ فَأَرْسَلْنَا عَلَيْهِمْ رِجْزًا مِّنَ ٱلسَّمَآءِ بِمَا كَانُوا۟ يَظْلِمُونَ
ayas.translation: But those who were unjust among them changed it for a saying other than that which had been spoken to them; so We sent upon them a pestilence from heaven because they were unjust.
ayas.transliteration: fabaddalal ladhīna ẓalamū minhum qawlan ghayral ladhī qīla lahum fa-arsalnā `alayhim rijzan minas samā-i bimā kānū yaẓlimūn

ayas.arabic: وَسْـَٔلْهُمْ عَنِ ٱلْقَرْيَةِ ٱلَّتِى كَانَتْ حَاضِرَةَ ٱلْبَحْرِ إِذْ يَعْدُونَ فِى ٱلسَّبْتِ إِذْ تَأْتِيهِمْ حِيتَانُهُمْ يَوْمَ سَبْتِهِمْ شُرَّعًا وَيَوْمَ لَا يَسْبِتُونَ ۙ لَا تَأْتِيهِمْ ۚ كَذَٰلِكَ نَبْلُوهُم بِمَا كَانُوا۟ يَفْسُقُونَ
ayas.translation: And ask them about the town which stood by the sea; when they exceeded the limits of the Sabbath, when their fish came to them on the day of their Sabbath, appearing on the surface of the water, and on the day on which they did not keep the Sabbath they did not come to them; thus did We try them because they transgressed.
ayas.transliteration: was-alhum `anil qaryatil latī kānat ḥāḍiratal baḥri idh ya`dūna fis sabti idh ta-tīhim ḥītānuhum yawma sabtihim shurra`an wayawma lā yasbitūna lā ta-tīhim ۚ kadhālika nablūhum bimā kānū yafsuqūn

ayas.arabic: وَإِذْ قَالَتْ أُمَّةٌ مِّنْهُمْ لِمَ تَعِظُونَ قَوْمًا ۙ ٱللَّهُ مُهْلِكُهُمْ أَوْ مُعَذِّبُهُمْ عَذَابًا شَدِيدًا ۖ قَالُوا۟ مَعْذِرَةً إِلَىٰ رَبِّكُمْ وَلَعَلَّهُمْ يَتَّقُونَ
ayas.translation: And when a party of them said: Why do you admonish a with a severe chastisement? They said: To be free from blame before your Lord, and that haply they may guard (against evil).
ayas.transliteration: wa idh qālat ummatun minhum lima ta`iẓūna qawmanillāhu muhlikuhum aw mu`adhhibuhum `adhāban shadīdā ۖ qālū ma`dhiratan ilā rabbikum wala`allahum yattaqūn

ayas.arabic: فَلَمَّا نَسُوا۟ مَا ذُكِّرُوا۟ بِهِۦٓ أَنجَيْنَا ٱلَّذِينَ يَنْهَوْنَ عَنِ ٱلسُّوٓءِ وَأَخَذْنَا ٱلَّذِينَ ظَلَمُوا۟ بِعَذَابٍۭ بَـِٔيسٍۭ بِمَا كَانُوا۟ يَفْسُقُونَ
ayas.translation: So when they neglected what they had been reminded of, We delivered those who forbade evil and We overtook those who were unjust with an evil chastisement because they transgressed.
ayas.transliteration: falammā nasū mā dhukkirū bihi anjaynal ladhīna yanhawna `anis sū-i wa-akhadhnal ladhīna ẓalamū bi`adhābin ba-īsin bimā kānū yafsuqūn

ayas.arabic: فَلَمَّا عَتَوْا۟ عَن مَّا نُهُوا۟ عَنْهُ قُلْنَا لَهُمْ كُونُوا۟ قِرَدَةً خَـٰسِـِٔينَ
ayas.translation: Therefore when they revoltingly persisted in what they had been forbidden, We said to them: Be (as) apes, despised and hated.
ayas.transliteration: falammā `ataw `an mā nuhū `anhu qulnā lahum kūnū qiradatan khāsi-īn

ayas.arabic: وَإِذْ تَأَذَّنَ رَبُّكَ لَيَبْعَثَنَّ عَلَيْهِمْ إِلَىٰ يَوْمِ ٱلْقِيَـٰمَةِ مَن يَسُومُهُمْ سُوٓءَ ٱلْعَذَابِ ۗ إِنَّ رَبَّكَ لَسَرِيعُ ٱلْعِقَابِ ۖ وَإِنَّهُۥ لَغَفُورٌ رَّحِيمٌ
ayas.translation: And when your Lord announced that He would certainly send against them to the day of resurrection those who would subject them to severe torment; most surely your Lord is quick to requite (evil) and most surely He is Forgiving, Merciful.
ayas.transliteration: wa idh ta-adhhana rabbuka layab`athanna `alayhim ilā yawmil qiyāmati man yasūmuhum sū al `adhāb ۗ inna rabbaka lasarī`ul `iqāb ۖ wa innahu laghafūrun raḥīm

ayas.arabic: وَقَطَّعْنَـٰهُمْ فِى ٱلْأَرْضِ أُمَمًا ۖ مِّنْهُمُ ٱلصَّـٰلِحُونَ وَمِنْهُمْ دُونَ ذَٰلِكَ ۖ وَبَلَوْنَـٰهُم بِٱلْحَسَنَـٰتِ وَٱلسَّيِّـَٔاتِ لَعَلَّهُمْ يَرْجِعُونَ
ayas.translation: And We cut them up on the earth into parties, (some) of them being righteous and (others) of them falling short of that, and We tried them with blessings and misfortunes that they might turn.
ayas.transliteration: waqaṭṭa`nāhum fil-arḍi umamā ۖ minhumuṣ ṣāliḥūna wa minhum dūna dhālik ۖ wabalawnāhum bil ḥasanāti was sayyi-āti la`allahum yarji`ūn

ayas.arabic: فَخَلَفَ مِنۢ بَعْدِهِمْ خَلْفٌ وَرِثُوا۟ ٱلْكِتَـٰبَ يَأْخُذُونَ عَرَضَ هَـٰذَا ٱلْأَدْنَىٰ وَيَقُولُونَ سَيُغْفَرُ لَنَا وَإِن يَأْتِهِمْ عَرَضٌ مِّثْلُهُۥ يَأْخُذُوهُ ۚ أَلَمْ يُؤْخَذْ عَلَيْهِم مِّيثَـٰقُ ٱلْكِتَـٰبِ أَن لَّا يَقُولُوا۟ عَلَى ٱللَّهِ إِلَّا ٱلْحَقَّ وَدَرَسُوا۟ مَا فِيهِ ۗ وَٱلدَّارُ ٱلْـَٔاخِرَةُ خَيْرٌ لِّلَّذِينَ يَتَّقُونَ ۗ أَفَلَا تَعْقِلُونَ
ayas.translation: Then there came after them an evil posterity who inherited the Book, taking only the frail good of this low life and saying: It will be forgiven us. And if the like good came to them, they would take it (too). Was not a promise taken from them in the Book that they would not speak anything about Allah but the truth, and they have read what is in it; and the abode of the hereafter is better for those who guard (against evil). Do you not then understand?
ayas.transliteration: fakhalafa min ba`dihim khalfun warithul kitāba ya-khudhūna `araḍa hādhal-adnā wayaqūlūna sayughfaru lanā wa in ya-tihim `araḍun mithluhu ya-khudhūh ۚ alam yu-khadh `alayhim mīthāqul kitābi an lā yaqūlū `alallāhi illal-ḥaqqa wadarasū mā fīh ۗ wad dārul-ākhiratu khayrul lilladhīna yattaqūn ۗ afalā ta`qilūn

ayas.arabic: وَٱلَّذِينَ يُمَسِّكُونَ بِٱلْكِتَـٰبِ وَأَقَامُوا۟ ٱلصَّلَوٰةَ إِنَّا لَا نُضِيعُ أَجْرَ ٱلْمُصْلِحِينَ
ayas.translation: And (as for) those who hold fast by the Book and keep up prayer, surely We do not waste the reward of the right doers.
ayas.transliteration: wal ladhīna yumassikūna bil kitābi wa-aqāmuṣ ṣalāta innā lā nuḍī`u ajral muṣliḥīn

ayas.arabic: وَإِذْ نَتَقْنَا ٱلْجَبَلَ فَوْقَهُمْ كَأَنَّهُۥ ظُلَّةٌ وَظَنُّوٓا۟ أَنَّهُۥ وَاقِعٌۢ بِهِمْ خُذُوا۟ مَآ ءَاتَيْنَـٰكُم بِقُوَّةٍ وَٱذْكُرُوا۟ مَا فِيهِ لَعَلَّكُمْ تَتَّقُونَ
ayas.translation: And when We shook the mountain over them as if it were a covering overhead, and they thought that it was going to fall down upon them: Take hold of what We have given you with firmness, and be mindful of what is in it, so that you may guard (against evil).
ayas.transliteration: wa idh nataqnal jabala fawqahum ka-annahu ẓullatun waẓannū annahu wāqi`un bihim khudhū mā ātaynākum biquwwatin wadhkurū mā fīhi la`allakum tattaqūn

ayas.arabic: وَإِذْ أَخَذَ رَبُّكَ مِنۢ بَنِىٓ ءَادَمَ مِن ظُهُورِهِمْ ذُرِّيَّتَهُمْ وَأَشْهَدَهُمْ عَلَىٰٓ أَنفُسِهِمْ أَلَسْتُ بِرَبِّكُمْ ۖ قَالُوا۟ بَلَىٰ ۛ شَهِدْنَآ ۛ أَن تَقُولُوا۟ يَوْمَ ٱلْقِيَـٰمَةِ إِنَّا كُنَّا عَنْ هَـٰذَا غَـٰفِلِينَ
ayas.translation: And when your Lord brought forth from the children of Adam, from their backs, their descendants, and made them bear witness against their own souls: Am I not your Lord? They said: Yes! we bear witness. Lest you should say on the day of resurrection: Surely we were heedless of this.
ayas.transliteration: wa idh akhadha rabbuka min banī ādama min ẓuhūrihim dhurriyyatahum wa-ash-hadahum `alā anfusihim alastu birabbikum ۖ qālū balā ۛ shahidnā ۛ an taqūlū yawmal qiyāmati innā kunnā `an hādhā ghāfilīn

ayas.arabic: أَوْ تَقُولُوٓا۟ إِنَّمَآ أَشْرَكَ ءَابَآؤُنَا مِن قَبْلُ وَكُنَّا ذُرِّيَّةً مِّنۢ بَعْدِهِمْ ۖ أَفَتُهْلِكُنَا بِمَا فَعَلَ ٱلْمُبْطِلُونَ
ayas.translation: Or you should say: Only our fathers associated others (with Allah) before, and we were an offspring after them: Wilt Thou then destroy us for what the vain doers did?
ayas.transliteration: aw taqūlū innamā ashraka ābā-unā min qablu wakunnā dhurriyyatan min ba`dihim ۖ afatuhlikunā bimā fa`alal-mubṭilūn

ayas.arabic: وَكَذَٰلِكَ نُفَصِّلُ ٱلْـَٔايَـٰتِ وَلَعَلَّهُمْ يَرْجِعُونَ
ayas.translation: And thus do We make clear the communications, and that haply they might return.
ayas.transliteration: wakadhālika nufaṣṣilul-āyāti wala`allahum yarji`ūn

ayas.arabic: وَٱتْلُ عَلَيْهِمْ نَبَأَ ٱلَّذِىٓ ءَاتَيْنَـٰهُ ءَايَـٰتِنَا فَٱنسَلَخَ مِنْهَا فَأَتْبَعَهُ ٱلشَّيْطَـٰنُ فَكَانَ مِنَ ٱلْغَاوِينَ
ayas.translation: And recite to them the narrative of him to whom We give Our communications, but he withdraws himself from them, so the Shaitan overtakes him, so he is of those who go astray.
ayas.transliteration: watlu `alayhim naba-al ladhī ātaynāhu āyātinā fansalakha minhā fa-atba`ahush shayṭānu fakāna minal ghāwyn

ayas.arabic: وَلَوْ شِئْنَا لَرَفَعْنَـٰهُ بِهَا وَلَـٰكِنَّهُۥٓ أَخْلَدَ إِلَى ٱلْأَرْضِ وَٱتَّبَعَ هَوَىٰهُ ۚ فَمَثَلُهُۥ كَمَثَلِ ٱلْكَلْبِ إِن تَحْمِلْ عَلَيْهِ يَلْهَثْ أَوْ تَتْرُكْهُ يَلْهَث ۚ ذَّٰلِكَ مَثَلُ ٱلْقَوْمِ ٱلَّذِينَ كَذَّبُوا۟ بِـَٔايَـٰتِنَا ۚ فَٱقْصُصِ ٱلْقَصَصَ لَعَلَّهُمْ يَتَفَكَّرُونَ
ayas.translation: And if We had pleased, We would certainly have exalted him thereby; but he clung to the earth and followed his low desire, so his parable is as the parable of the dog; if you attack him he lolls out his tongue; and if you leave him alone he lolls out his tongue; this is the parable of the people who reject Our communications; therefore relate the narrative that they may reflect.
ayas.transliteration: walaw shi-nā larafa`nāhu bihā walākinnahu akhlada ilal-arḍi wattaba`a hawāh ۚ famathaluhu kamathalil kalbi in taḥmil `alayhi yalhath aw tatruk-hu yalhath ۚ dhālika mathalul qawmil ladhīna kadhhabū bi-āyātinā ۚ faqṣuṣil qaṣaṣa la`allahum yatafakkarūn

ayas.arabic: سَآءَ مَثَلًا ٱلْقَوْمُ ٱلَّذِينَ كَذَّبُوا۟ بِـَٔايَـٰتِنَا وَأَنفُسَهُمْ كَانُوا۟ يَظْلِمُونَ
ayas.translation: Evil is the likeness of the people who reject Our communications and are unjust to their own souls.
ayas.transliteration: sā-a mathalanil-qawmul ladhīna kadhhabū bi-āyātinā wa-anfusahum kānū yaẓlimūn

ayas.arabic: مَن يَهْدِ ٱللَّهُ فَهُوَ ٱلْمُهْتَدِى ۖ وَمَن يُضْلِلْ فَأُو۟لَـٰٓئِكَ هُمُ ٱلْخَـٰسِرُونَ
ayas.translation: Whomsoever Allah guides, he is the one who follows the right way; and whomsoever He causes to err, these are the losers.
ayas.transliteration: man yahdillāhu fahuwal muhtadī ۖ wa man yuḍlil fa-ulā-ika humul khāsirūn

ayas.arabic: وَلَقَدْ ذَرَأْنَا لِجَهَنَّمَ كَثِيرًا مِّنَ ٱلْجِنِّ وَٱلْإِنسِ ۖ لَهُمْ قُلُوبٌ لَّا يَفْقَهُونَ بِهَا وَلَهُمْ أَعْيُنٌ لَّا يُبْصِرُونَ بِهَا وَلَهُمْ ءَاذَانٌ لَّا يَسْمَعُونَ بِهَآ ۚ أُو۟لَـٰٓئِكَ كَٱلْأَنْعَـٰمِ بَلْ هُمْ أَضَلُّ ۚ أُو۟لَـٰٓئِكَ هُمُ ٱلْغَـٰفِلُونَ
ayas.translation: And certainly We have created for hell many of the jinn and the men; they have hearts with which they do not understand, and they have eyes with which they do not see, and they have ears with which they do not hear; they are as cattle, nay, they are in worse errors; these are the heedless ones.
ayas.transliteration: walaqad dhara-nā lijahannama kathīran minal jinni wal-ins ۖ lahum qulūbul lā yafqahūna bihā walahum a`yunul lā yubṣirūna bihā walahum ādhānul lā yasma`ūna bihā ۚ ulā-ika kal-an`āmi bal hum aḍall ۚ ulā-ika humul ghāfilūn

ayas.arabic: وَلِلَّهِ ٱلْأَسْمَآءُ ٱلْحُسْنَىٰ فَٱدْعُوهُ بِهَا ۖ وَذَرُوا۟ ٱلَّذِينَ يُلْحِدُونَ فِىٓ أَسْمَـٰٓئِهِۦ ۚ سَيُجْزَوْنَ مَا كَانُوا۟ يَعْمَلُونَ
ayas.translation: And Allah's are the best names, therefore call on Him thereby, and leave alone those who violate the sanctity of His names; they shall be recompensed for what they did.
ayas.transliteration: walillāhil-asmā-ul ḥusnā fad`ūhu bihā ۖ wadharul ladhīna yulḥidūna fī asmā-ih ۚ sayujzawna mā kānū ya`malūn

ayas.arabic: وَمِمَّنْ خَلَقْنَآ أُمَّةٌ يَهْدُونَ بِٱلْحَقِّ وَبِهِۦ يَعْدِلُونَ
ayas.translation: And of those whom We have created are a people who guide with the truth and thereby they do justice.
ayas.transliteration: wa mimman khalaqnā ummatun yahdūna bil ḥaqqi wabihi ya`dilūn

ayas.arabic: وَٱلَّذِينَ كَذَّبُوا۟ بِـَٔايَـٰتِنَا سَنَسْتَدْرِجُهُم مِّنْ حَيْثُ لَا يَعْلَمُونَ
ayas.translation: And (as to) those who reject Our communications, We draw them near (to destruction) by degrees from whence they know not.
ayas.transliteration: wal ladhīna kadhhabū bi-āyātinā sanastadrijuhum min ḥaythu lā ya`lamūn

ayas.arabic: وَأُمْلِى لَهُمْ ۚ إِنَّ كَيْدِى مَتِينٌ
ayas.translation: And I grant them respite; surely My scheme is effective.
ayas.transliteration: wa-umlī lahum ۚ inna kaydī matīn

ayas.arabic: أَوَلَمْ يَتَفَكَّرُوا۟ ۗ مَا بِصَاحِبِهِم مِّن جِنَّةٍ ۚ إِنْ هُوَ إِلَّا نَذِيرٌ مُّبِينٌ
ayas.translation: Do they not reflect that their companion has not unsoundness in mind; he is only a plain warner.
ayas.transliteration: awalam yatafakkarū ۗ mā biṣāḥibihim min jinnah ۚ in huwa illā nadhīrun mubīn

ayas.arabic: أَوَلَمْ يَنظُرُوا۟ فِى مَلَكُوتِ ٱلسَّمَـٰوَٰتِ وَٱلْأَرْضِ وَمَا خَلَقَ ٱللَّهُ مِن شَىْءٍ وَأَنْ عَسَىٰٓ أَن يَكُونَ قَدِ ٱقْتَرَبَ أَجَلُهُمْ ۖ فَبِأَىِّ حَدِيثٍۭ بَعْدَهُۥ يُؤْمِنُونَ
ayas.translation: Do they not consider the kingdom of the heavens and the earth and whatever things Allah has created, and that may be their doom shall have drawn nigh; what announcement would they then believe in after this?
ayas.transliteration: awalam yanẓurū fī malakūtis samāwāti wal-arḍi wa mā khalaqallāhu min shay-in wa-an `asā an yakūna qadiq-taraba ajaluhum ۖ fabi-ayyi ḥadīthin ba`dahu yu-minūn

ayas.arabic: مَن يُضْلِلِ ٱللَّهُ فَلَا هَادِىَ لَهُۥ ۚ وَيَذَرُهُمْ فِى طُغْيَـٰنِهِمْ يَعْمَهُونَ
ayas.translation: Whomsoever Allah causes to err, there is no guide for him; and He leaves them alone in their inordinacy, blindly wandering on.
ayas.transliteration: man yuḍlilillāhu falā hādiya lah ۚ wayadharuhum fī ṭughyānihim ya`mahūn

ayas.arabic: يَسْـَٔلُونَكَ عَنِ ٱلسَّاعَةِ أَيَّانَ مُرْسَىٰهَا ۖ قُلْ إِنَّمَا عِلْمُهَا عِندَ رَبِّى ۖ لَا يُجَلِّيهَا لِوَقْتِهَآ إِلَّا هُوَ ۚ ثَقُلَتْ فِى ٱلسَّمَـٰوَٰتِ وَٱلْأَرْضِ ۚ لَا تَأْتِيكُمْ إِلَّا بَغْتَةً ۗ يَسْـَٔلُونَكَ كَأَنَّكَ حَفِىٌّ عَنْهَا ۖ قُلْ إِنَّمَا عِلْمُهَا عِندَ ٱللَّهِ وَلَـٰكِنَّ أَكْثَرَ ٱلنَّاسِ لَا يَعْلَمُونَ
ayas.translation: They ask you about the hour, when will be its taking place? Say: The knowledge of it is only with my Lord; none but He shall manifest it at its time; it will be momentous in the heavens and the earth; it will not come on you but of a sudden. They ask you as if you were solicitous about it. Say: Its knowledge is only with Allah, but most people do not know.
ayas.transliteration: yas-alūnaka `anis sā`ati ayyāna mursāhā ۖ qul innamā `il-muhā `inda rabbī ۖ lā yujallīhā liwaqtihā illā huw ۚ thaqulat fis samāwāti wal-arḍ ۚ lā ta-tīkum illā baghtah ۗ yas-alūnaka ka-annaka ḥafiyyun `anhā ۖ qul innamā `il-muhā `indallāhi walākinna aktharan nāsi lā ya`lamūn

ayas.arabic: قُل لَّآ أَمْلِكُ لِنَفْسِى نَفْعًا وَلَا ضَرًّا إِلَّا مَا شَآءَ ٱللَّهُ ۚ وَلَوْ كُنتُ أَعْلَمُ ٱلْغَيْبَ لَٱسْتَكْثَرْتُ مِنَ ٱلْخَيْرِ وَمَا مَسَّنِىَ ٱلسُّوٓءُ ۚ إِنْ أَنَا۠ إِلَّا نَذِيرٌ وَبَشِيرٌ لِّقَوْمٍ يُؤْمِنُونَ
ayas.translation: Say: I do not control any benefit or harm for my own soul except as Allah please; and had I known the unseen I would have had much of good and no evil would have touched me; I am nothing but a warner and the giver of good news to a people who believe.
ayas.transliteration: qul lā amliku linafsī naf`an walā ḍarran illā mā shā-allāh ۚ walaw kuntu a`lamul ghayba lastakthartu minal khayri wa mā massaniyas sū-u ۚ in ana illā nadhīrun wabashīrul liqawmiy yu-minūn

ayas.arabic: هُوَ ٱلَّذِى خَلَقَكُم مِّن نَّفْسٍ وَٰحِدَةٍ وَجَعَلَ مِنْهَا زَوْجَهَا لِيَسْكُنَ إِلَيْهَا ۖ فَلَمَّا تَغَشَّىٰهَا حَمَلَتْ حَمْلًا خَفِيفًا فَمَرَّتْ بِهِۦ ۖ فَلَمَّآ أَثْقَلَت دَّعَوَا ٱللَّهَ رَبَّهُمَا لَئِنْ ءَاتَيْتَنَا صَـٰلِحًا لَّنَكُونَنَّ مِنَ ٱلشَّـٰكِرِينَ
ayas.translation: He it is Who created you from a single being, and of the same (kind) did He make his mate, that he might incline to her; so when he covers her she bears a light burden, then moves about with it; but when it grows heavy, they both call upon Allah, their Lord: If Thou givest us a good one, we shall certainly be of the grateful ones.
ayas.transliteration: huwal ladhī khalaqakum min nafsin wāḥidatin waja`ala minhā zawjahā liyaskuna ilayhā ۖ falammā taghashhāhā ḥamalat ḥamlan khafīfan famarrat bih ۖ falammā athqalat da`awallāha rabbahumā la-in ātaytanā ṣāliḥal lanakūnanna minash shākirīn

ayas.arabic: فَلَمَّآ ءَاتَىٰهُمَا صَـٰلِحًا جَعَلَا لَهُۥ شُرَكَآءَ فِيمَآ ءَاتَىٰهُمَا ۚ فَتَعَـٰلَى ٱللَّهُ عَمَّا يُشْرِكُونَ
ayas.translation: But when He gives them a good one, they set up with Him associates in what He has given them; but high is Allah above what they associate (with Him).
ayas.transliteration: falammā ātāhumā ṣāliḥan ja`alā lahu shurakā-a fīmā ātāhumā ۚ fata`ālallāhu `ammā yushrikūn

ayas.arabic: أَيُشْرِكُونَ مَا لَا يَخْلُقُ شَيْـًٔا وَهُمْ يُخْلَقُونَ
ayas.translation: What! they associate (with Him) that which does not create any thing, while they are themselves created!
ayas.transliteration: ayushrikūna mā lā yakhluqu shay-an wahum yukhlaqūn

ayas.arabic: وَلَا يَسْتَطِيعُونَ لَهُمْ نَصْرًا وَلَآ أَنفُسَهُمْ يَنصُرُونَ
ayas.translation: And they have no power to give them help, nor can they help themselves.
ayas.transliteration: walā yastaṭī`ūna lahum naṣran walā anfusahum yanṣurūn

ayas.arabic: وَإِن تَدْعُوهُمْ إِلَى ٱلْهُدَىٰ لَا يَتَّبِعُوكُمْ ۚ سَوَآءٌ عَلَيْكُمْ أَدَعَوْتُمُوهُمْ أَمْ أَنتُمْ صَـٰمِتُونَ
ayas.translation: And if you invite them to guidance, they will not follow you; it is the same to you whether you invite them or you are silent.
ayas.transliteration: wa in tad`ūhum ilal-hudā lā yattabi`ūkum ۚ sawā-un `alaykum ada`awtumūhum am antum ṣāmitūn

ayas.arabic: إِنَّ ٱلَّذِينَ تَدْعُونَ مِن دُونِ ٱللَّهِ عِبَادٌ أَمْثَالُكُمْ ۖ فَٱدْعُوهُمْ فَلْيَسْتَجِيبُوا۟ لَكُمْ إِن كُنتُمْ صَـٰدِقِينَ
ayas.translation: Surely those whom you call on besides Allah are in a state of subjugation like yourselves; therefore call on them, then let them answer you if you are truthful.
ayas.transliteration: innal ladhīna tad`ūna min dūnillāhi `ibādun amthālukum ۖ fad`ūhum falyastajībū lakum in kuntum ṣādiqīn

ayas.arabic: أَلَهُمْ أَرْجُلٌ يَمْشُونَ بِهَآ ۖ أَمْ لَهُمْ أَيْدٍ يَبْطِشُونَ بِهَآ ۖ أَمْ لَهُمْ أَعْيُنٌ يُبْصِرُونَ بِهَآ ۖ أَمْ لَهُمْ ءَاذَانٌ يَسْمَعُونَ بِهَا ۗ قُلِ ٱدْعُوا۟ شُرَكَآءَكُمْ ثُمَّ كِيدُونِ فَلَا تُنظِرُونِ
ayas.translation: Have they feet with which they walk, or have they hands with which they hold, or have they eyes with which they see, or have they ears with which they hear? Say: Call your associates, then make a struggle (to prevail) against me and give me no respite.
ayas.transliteration: alahum arjulun yamshūna bihā ۖ am lahum aydiy yabṭishūna bihā ۖ am lahum a`yunun yubṣirūna bihā ۖ am lahum ādhānun yasma`ūna bihā ۗ qulid-`ū shurakā-akum thumma kīdūni falā tunẓirūn

ayas.arabic: إِنَّ وَلِـِّۧىَ ٱللَّهُ ٱلَّذِى نَزَّلَ ٱلْكِتَـٰبَ ۖ وَهُوَ يَتَوَلَّى ٱلصَّـٰلِحِينَ
ayas.translation: Surely my guardian is Allah, Who revealed the Book, and He befriends the good.
ayas.transliteration: inna waliyyiyallāhul ladhī nazzalal-kitāb ۖ wahuwa yatawallaṣ ṣāliḥīn

ayas.arabic: وَٱلَّذِينَ تَدْعُونَ مِن دُونِهِۦ لَا يَسْتَطِيعُونَ نَصْرَكُمْ وَلَآ أَنفُسَهُمْ يَنصُرُونَ
ayas.translation: And those whom you call upon besides Him are not able to help you, nor can they help themselves.
ayas.transliteration: wal ladhīna tad`ūna min dūnihi lā yastaṭī`ūna naṣrakum walā anfusahum yanṣurūn

ayas.arabic: وَإِن تَدْعُوهُمْ إِلَى ٱلْهُدَىٰ لَا يَسْمَعُوا۟ ۖ وَتَرَىٰهُمْ يَنظُرُونَ إِلَيْكَ وَهُمْ لَا يُبْصِرُونَ
ayas.translation: And if you invite them to guidance, they do not hear; and you see them looking towards you, yet they do not see.
ayas.transliteration: wa in tad`ūhum ilal-hudā lā yasma`ū ۖ watarāhum yanẓurūna ilayka wahum lā yubṣirūn

ayas.arabic: خُذِ ٱلْعَفْوَ وَأْمُرْ بِٱلْعُرْفِ وَأَعْرِضْ عَنِ ٱلْجَـٰهِلِينَ
ayas.translation: Take to forgiveness and enjoin good and turn aside from the ignorant.
ayas.transliteration: khudhil `afwa wa-mur bil `urfi wa-a`riḍ `anil jāhilīn

ayas.arabic: وَإِمَّا يَنزَغَنَّكَ مِنَ ٱلشَّيْطَـٰنِ نَزْغٌ فَٱسْتَعِذْ بِٱللَّهِ ۚ إِنَّهُۥ سَمِيعٌ عَلِيمٌ
ayas.translation: And if a false imputation from the Shaitan afflict you, seek refuge in Allah; surely He is Hearing, Knowing.
ayas.transliteration: wa immā yanzaghannaka minash shayṭāni nazghun fasta`idh billāh ۚ innahu samī`un `alīm

ayas.arabic: إِنَّ ٱلَّذِينَ ٱتَّقَوْا۟ إِذَا مَسَّهُمْ طَـٰٓئِفٌ مِّنَ ٱلشَّيْطَـٰنِ تَذَكَّرُوا۟ فَإِذَا هُم مُّبْصِرُونَ
ayas.translation: Surely those who guard (against evil), when a visitation from the Shaitan afflicts them they become mindful, then lo! they see.
ayas.transliteration: innal ladhīnat-taqaw idhā massahum ṭā-ifun minash shayṭāni tadhakkarū fa-idhā hum mubṣirūn

ayas.arabic: وَإِخْوَٰنُهُمْ يَمُدُّونَهُمْ فِى ٱلْغَىِّ ثُمَّ لَا يُقْصِرُونَ
ayas.translation: And their brethren increase them in error, then they cease not.
ayas.transliteration: wa ikhwānuhum yamuddūnahum fil ghayyi thumma lā yuqṣirūn

ayas.arabic: وَإِذَا لَمْ تَأْتِهِم بِـَٔايَةٍ قَالُوا۟ لَوْلَا ٱجْتَبَيْتَهَا ۚ قُلْ إِنَّمَآ أَتَّبِعُ مَا يُوحَىٰٓ إِلَىَّ مِن رَّبِّى ۚ هَـٰذَا بَصَآئِرُ مِن رَّبِّكُمْ وَهُدًى وَرَحْمَةٌ لِّقَوْمٍ يُؤْمِنُونَ
ayas.translation: And when you bring them not a revelation they say: Why do you not forge it? Say: I only follow what is revealed to me from my Lord; these are clear proofs from your Lord and a guidance and a mercy for a people who believe.
ayas.transliteration: wa idhā lam ta-tihim bi-āyatin qālū lawlaj-tabaytahā ۚ qul innamā attabi`u mā yūḥā ilayya min rabbī ۚ hādhā baṣā-iru min rabbikum wahudan waraḥmatun liqawmiy yu-minūn

ayas.arabic: وَإِذَا قُرِئَ ٱلْقُرْءَانُ فَٱسْتَمِعُوا۟ لَهُۥ وَأَنصِتُوا۟ لَعَلَّكُمْ تُرْحَمُونَ
ayas.translation: And when the Quran is recited, then listen to it and remain silent, that mercy may be shown to you.
ayas.transliteration: wa idhā quri-al qur-ānu fastami`ū lahu wa-anṣitū la`allakum turḥamūn

ayas.arabic: وَٱذْكُر رَّبَّكَ فِى نَفْسِكَ تَضَرُّعًا وَخِيفَةً وَدُونَ ٱلْجَهْرِ مِنَ ٱلْقَوْلِ بِٱلْغُدُوِّ وَٱلْـَٔاصَالِ وَلَا تَكُن مِّنَ ٱلْغَـٰفِلِينَ
ayas.translation: And remember your Lord within yourself humbly and fearing and in a voice not loud in the morning and the evening and be not of the heedless ones.
ayas.transliteration: wadhkur rabbaka fī nafsika taḍarru`an wakhīfatan wadūnal jahri minal qawli bil ghuduwwi wal-āṣāli walā takun minal ghāfilīn

ayas.arabic: إِنَّ ٱلَّذِينَ عِندَ رَبِّكَ لَا يَسْتَكْبِرُونَ عَنْ عِبَادَتِهِۦ وَيُسَبِّحُونَهُۥ وَلَهُۥ يَسْجُدُونَ ۩
ayas.translation: Surely those who are with your Lord are not too proud to serve Him, and they declare His glory and prostrate in humility before Him.
ayas.transliteration: innal ladhīna `inda rabbika lā yastakbirūna `an `ibādatihi wayusabbiḥūnahu walahu yasjudūn ۩
